about_the_game:
EarthX 2 is a casual, space company management game where you start as a small startup on Earth and grow into a pioneering force capable of terraforming Mars. Build rockets, expand to new planets, and take on the challenges of turning humanity into a multi-planetary species—all at your own pace.

  

    
In EarthX 2, your main goal is to build rockets in your factories and launch payloads into different orbits. Each rocket has unique range and payload capabilities, giving you plenty of options to meet your mission goals. But don’t forget—accidents can happen, and explosions are part of the challenge!

   

Sign contracts and race against time to launch payloads before their deadlines.

EarthX 2 features dozens of real-life-inspired contracts, from deploying satellites into orbit to resupplying the International Space Station. You can even transport astronauts and bring them back safely to Earth after their six-month missions. The inventory window helps you keep track of all your items and payloads across multiple planets.

   
As your space program grows, so does your workload.

Launching more rockets more often can get overwhelming, but automation is here to help! Program your rockets with custom commands, set execution intervals, and even combine tasks into more advanced sequences.

     
Why stop at rockets when you can build your own Internet empire?

Manufacture satellites and routers, launch massive constellations into orbit, and start your own internet service to generate billions. Satellite altitude matters—low orbits offer faster speeds but need frequent replacements, while higher orbits last longer but are slower. Upgrade your satellites for better performance and capacity to dominate the market.

    

Research new rockets, capsules, and spaceships to keep advancing. Each project takes time and money, so careful planning is key.

EarthX 2 also includes fun mini-games that let you unlock or upgrade special features. Master precision rocket landings on droneships, catch rockets with helicopters, or try the challenging "Belly Flop" spaceship landing maneuver!

        
Build a fleet of spaceships and expand humanity to the Moon, Mars, Phobos, or even Europa. Colonies need power, water, oxygen, and food to survive, so until they’re self-sustaining, you’ll need to manage logistics from Earth carefully.

Planetary windows add a layer of strategy, as spaceships can only reach certain destinations at specific times. Use parking orbits to plan your missions perfectly.

     
Unlock mega projects like the Hub Space Station. Built in orbit, this massive station can dock up to 24 spaceships, making it perfect for transferring resources between planets quickly and efficiently.

      
EarthX 2 features clean, low-poly graphics with a cozy aesthetic and realistic planet atmosphere simulation. The exclusive soundtrack by MELOKHROMA sets the perfect tone for your journey into space.

Our modern user interface is both functional and customizable. Pin important information with Quick Access, resize and drag windows to suit your style, and enjoy smooth performance—even with big lists. The in-game camera is carefully tuned to give you the perfect view from any angle.
